CustomField.formula:
OR(
AND( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Revised CDC Uploaded"), ispickval(VoIP_Translations_Stage__c, "") ),
AND( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Revised CDC Uploaded"), ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "") ),
AND( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Revised CDC Uploaded"), ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "Review Order") ),
AND( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Revised CDC Uploaded"), ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "Revised CDC Uploaded") ),
AND( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Revised CDC Uploaded"), ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "Checklist in Progress") ),
AND( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Revised CDC Uploaded"), ispickval(VoIP_Translations_Stage__c, "Review Order") ),
AND( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Revised CDC Uploaded"), ispickval(VoIP_Translations_Stage__c, "Translations In Progress") ),
AND( ispickval(CPE_DCS_Stage__c, "Revised CDC Uploaded"), ispickval(VoIP_Translations_Stage__c, "Translation Complete") ),
AND( ispickval( VoIP_Translations_Stage__c, "Translation Complete"), ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "Checklist Completed") ),
AND( ispickval( VoIP_Translations_Stage__c, "Final CDC Uploaded"), ispickval(Hot_Cut_Stage__c, "Checklist in Progress") ) )
CustomField.label: CPEDCS Lock
